About the job
About Alaan

Alaan is the SuperCard‚Ñ¢ for businesses and the most loved fintech in the Middle East. Our mission is to simplify finance for businesses so they can save time and money.
Alaan provides everything businesses need to manage and control expenses, including the SuperCard‚Ñ¢, AI-powered automation and insights, streamlined accounting, and centralized dashboards, all in one place.


Over 1500 businesses in the UAE and KSA, from startups to enterprises, use Alaan to control spending and save costs.


Backed by Y Combinator and top global investors- including founders and executives of leading startups - Alaan is built by a world-class team from McKinsey, BCG, Goldman Sachs, Barclays, Zomato, Careem, Rippling, and other high-growth companies.


We‚Äôre not just building software. We‚Äôre reimagining how finance works for modern businesses across the region.


About the role

At Alaan, we‚Äôre building the modern financial stack for businesses across MENA‚Äîempowering companies to manage cards, payments, and expenses with intelligence and automation. A key part of this vision is our ML-powered product features, which drive smarter decisions, faster processes, and better customer experiences.


We‚Äôre looking for a strategic, senior-level Data Scientist to own the entire lifecycle of our machine learning features - from concept to production - and to act as the bridge between data science, engineering, and product. This is not just a modeling role - you‚Äôll be setting the vision, defining the strategy, and ensuring that every AI-driven feature in our product is impactful, robust, and continuously improving.


If you‚Äôre excited by the idea of taking a feature from 80% to 90%+ accuracy, love working cross-functionally, and want to lead high-impact AI initiatives in fintech, this is the role for you.


What you'll do

Define the Data Science Strategy: Translate product goals into clear, testable data science problems and technical requirements. Own the ‚Äúwhat‚Äù and the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù for ML initiatives.
Oversee the Modeling Lifecycle: Lead the team through Proof-of-Concepts (POCs), benchmarking, and productionization. Provide expert feedback on model selection, feature engineering, and validation.
Set Success Criteria: Define robust metrics, benchmarks, and offline/online evaluation methods to measure success across the lifecycle.
Drive Iterative Improvement: Monitor in-production performance, run A/B tests, and formulate experiments to push accuracy, efficiency, and user impact to the next level.
Ensure Technical Excellence: Act as the quality gatekeeper‚Äîensuring models are well-architected, scalable, and production-ready before deployment.
Lead Cross-Functional Delivery: Collaborate with Data Scientists, ML Engineers, Analysts, and Backend Engineers to ensure seamless execution and alignment with business goals.


What we are looking for

5+ years of experience in data science, with a proven record of delivering ML features to production.
Deep ML expertise and strong grasp of the entire ML lifecycle - model design, training, validation, deployment, monitoring, and iteration.
Strategic thinking ability to connect business needs to data science solutions, and prioritize based on impact.
Leadership & mentorship experience of guiding teams, providing constructive technical feedback, and raising the quality bar.
Communication ability to explain complex technical topics clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Lifecycle mastery and first-hand experience taking models from concept to production, troubleshooting failures, and leading improvements.
Prior experience as a Tech Lead or Principal Data Scientist.
Expertise in MLOps tools and best practices.
Fintech domain experience.


 What's in it for you

Contribute to building the Middle East‚Äôs most beloved fintech brand from the ground up
Benefit from a role with significant ownership and accountability
Thrive in a flexible hybrid culture with ample work-life balance
Participate in exciting offsite events
Competitive salary and equity
Enjoy additional perks like travel allowances, gym memberships, and more

About the job
Overview

Come build community, explore your passions and do your best work at Microsoft with thousands of University interns from every corner of the world. This opportunity will allow you to bring your aspirations, talent, potential‚Äîand excitement for the journey ahead.

As a Data Scientist Intern at Microsoft, you will use machine learning, statistics, experiments, and more to build and improve great products while making business impact. As a Data Scientist intern you will collaborate with stakeholders, formulate approaches to solve problems and use algorithms and data sources in the context of business and engineering needs. You will also be able to combine your engineering abilities with analytical skills to make customer experiences better. Our Data Scientists use innovative methods, algorithms and tools daily to drive results throughout Microsoft devices, operating systems, products, and services and provide novel insights into business and customer scenarios.

‚Ä¢ Tools: Experience with SQL and data science libraries (Scikit-learn, Pandas, Statsmodels, or PyTorch/TensorFlow).

Internship Benefits
